attributes.action: Bestow a Knighthood upon Arif Pirbhai for his services to education.
attributes.background: I and the majority of the population on the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland strongly believe that Arif Inayat Pirbhai of Bolton, Lancashire should be rewarded with a Knighthood for his services to education.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 

https://www.gov.uk/honours
